original_text: besides their 7,337 male and female slaves; and they also had 245 male and female singers.
korean_text: 그 외에 노비가 칠천삼백삼십칠 명이요 그들에게 노래하는 남녀가 이백사십오 명이 있었고

sentences.original_text: besides their 7,337 male and female slaves
and they also had 245 male and female singers
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 또한 245명의 남녀 가수를 가지고 있었다
